CutSceneText.Text: Now I can return to the flow of Aether.
But first I have a favor to beg of you.
Please forgive my beloved Bollvig, and help him return once more to Asmodae.
I'm sorry, but that's not going to happen.
Bollvig isn't going to be swayed by my words,
and besides, Elysea has suffered too much at his hands.
The brigade generals of all the Elyos fortresses, even the admiral of Blue Fleet....
If he is guilty of anything,
it is of loving me more than his own life.
This would never have happened if my life had not been taken from me so unjustly.
Oh, why did Bollvig and I ever meet?
